alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 10:46AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Aitkin and southern Crow Wing Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1045 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Upper South Long Lake, or 8 miles east of Brainerd, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deerwood around 1050 AM CDT. Garrison around 1055 AM CDT. Mille Lacs Lake around 1110 AM CDT. Malmo around 1115 AM CDT. McGrath around 1130 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Legionville, Camp Lake, North Long Lake, Riverton, Crow Wing State Park, Ripple Lake, Dads Corner, Glory, Glen and Pine Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Duluth MN.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass
